SELECT uuid()
INSERT INTO equipment(eq_id,eq_type,eq_name,brand_name, purchas_depart,belong_depart,purchas_date,supplier,eq_state_id, purchas_price,custom_message) VALUES(#{eqId},#{eqType},#{eqName}, #{brandName},#{purchasDepart},#{belongDepart},#{purchasDate},#{supplier}, #{eqStateId},#{dPurchasPrice},#{customMessage})
